results.description: Bayern Munich come from behind to thrash Mainz at Allianz Arena, with six different players on target.
results.shortTitle: Bayern thrash Mainz to stay second
results.title: Bayern Munich 6-1 Mainz: Hosts win with six different scorers

thumbnail.altText: David Alaba, Robert Lewandowski, Alphonse Davies, Bayern Munich

results.description: Nigeria striker Taiwo Awoniyi is loaned to German side Mainz from English Premier League club Liverpool.
results.shortTitle: Nigeria's Awoniyi joins Mainz on loan
results.title: Taiwo Awoniyi: Liverpool's Nigerian striker joins Mainz on loan

results.description: Everton sign Mainz midfielder Jean-Philippe Gbamin for £25m on a five-year contract.
results.title: Jean-Philippe Gbamin: Everton sign Mainz midfielder for £25m in five-year deal

results.description: West Ham are interested in signing Fenerbahce captain and Turkey left-back Hasan Ali Kaldirim.
results.shortTitle: West Ham want Fenerbahce captain Kaldirim
results.title: Hasan Ali Kaldirim: West Ham interested in signing Fenerbahce captain

results.description: England forward Jadon Sancho makes history with two more goals as Borussia Dortmund beat Mainz to go top of the Bundesliga, for a day at least.
results.shortTitle: Sancho makes history with Dortmund double
results.title: Borussia Dortmund 2-1 Mainz: Jadon Sancho sends Dortmund to top of table

results.description: James Rodriguez scores a hat-trick as Bayern Munich regain top spot in the Bundesliga with a thumping win over Mainz 05.
results.title: Bayern Munich 6-0 Mainz 05: James Rodriguez hat-trick helps champions retake Bundesliga lead

results.description: Yoshinori Muto has become Newcastle United's fifth summer signing after joining from Mainz.
results.title: Yoshinori Muto: Newcastle confirm signing of Japan striker from Mainz

results.description: RB Leipzig midfielder Naby Keita, who is joining Liverpool in July, is sent off for the fourth time this season as his team lose at Mainz.
results.title: Mainz 05 3-0 RB Leipzig

results.description: Referee Guido Winkmann recalls the Mainz and Freiburg players from their dressing rooms at half-time to award a penalty given by VAR.
results.shortTitle: Is this the most bizarre use of VAR so far?
results.title: VAR in Bundesliga: Mainz & Freiburg players called back at half-time for penalty

results.description: A penalty was awarded after players had already left the pitch for half-time in Mainz's Bundesliga win over relegation rivals Freiburg on Monday.
results.shortTitle: Mainz awarded VAR penalty at half-time
results.title: Mainz v Freiburg: Hosts awarded penalty on VAR after half-time whistle blown

thumbnail.altText: Mainz's Pablo de Blasis speaks with referee Guido Winkmann before taking his penalty against Freiburg

results.description: German champions Bayern Munich extend their Bundesliga lead to 18 points with a comfortable victory at Mainz.
results.title: Mainz 05 0-2 Bayern Munich

results.description: Borussia Dortmund secure their first Bundesliga victory since September with a 2-0 win at Mainz.
results.title: Mainz 0-2 Borussia Dortmund

results.description: Mainz goalkeeper Robin Zentner has a moment to forget as he mistakes the penalty spot for a football and his missed kick attempt nearly results in a goal for Borussia Monchengladbach in the Bundesliga.
results.shortTitle: Mainz keeper gets away with embarrassing air-kick
results.title: Mainz goalkeeper Robin Zentner gets away with embarrassing air-kick

results.description: Kocin tawagar kwallon kafar Nigeria, Gernot Rohr ya gayyaci 'yan wasa 24 domin karawa da Algeria a wasan shiga gasar cin kofin duniya da wasan sada zumunta da Argentina.
results.title: Super Eagles ta gayyaci Ahmed Musa da 'yan wasa 23

results.description: Robert Lewandowski scores twice on his 100th Bundesliga appearance with Bayern Munich as his side thrash Mainz.
results.title: Bayern Munich 4-0 Mainz 05

results.description: Stoke City forward Bojan Krkic joins Bundesliga side Mainz on loan until the end of the season.
results.shortTitle: Stoke forward Bojan joins Mainz on loan
results.title: Bojan Krkic: Stoke City forward joins Mainz on loan
